solution_line_template: The salad was three times the price of one pack of fries, so it cost {salad_price_multiplier} * {price_per_pack_fries} = $<<{salad_price_multiplier}*{price_per_pack_fries}={cost_salad}>>{cost_salad}.
The cost of the burger was {total_paid} - {cost_salad} - {cost_fries} = $<<{total_paid}-{cost_salad}-{cost_fries}={cost_burger}>>{cost_burger}.
